question:
[William] took his sister [Michele] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Leila] and [Martin] are siblings who are enjoying lunch together. [Ethel] went to visit her daughter [Leila] the other day. [Ethel]'s son [Gordon] was too busy at work to go along. [Larry]'s son, [Martin], was mowing the lawn. [Larry]'s sister, [Judy], asked [Martin] if he wanted some lemonade. [Gordon] went to lunch with his aunt [Michele]. [Oscar] and his son [William] went to look at cars. [Oscar] ended up buying the Mustang. [Dannielle] and [Oscar] left that evening to go bowling.
Question: How is [Dannielle] related to [Judy]?
